content: this manner alternating c1 and c2 with every 7 repeats of row 1 and 2 4 more times ending with a c2 section you will have 5 stripes each of c1 and c2 429 sts begin garter stripes border switch to smaller needles and c1 yarn row 1 rs k2 yo knit to marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l knit to last 2 sts yo k2 4 sts increase d row 2 ws k2 yo knit to last 2 sts yo k2 2 sts increase d 435 sts switch to c2 repeat row 1 and 2 441 sts © sonder yarn co 2023 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only
